name: Crabby Seastride
description:
Crabby just woke up in his Mangrove tree,
it’s another beautiful day by the sea.  
It’s time for a stride, let’s see who’s outside...Wait who is that guy?!  
And why does he have those crabs locked up in cages...  
All these are questions best left to the ages!  
So come adventure with Crabby, set worries aside
and join in this magical world with Seastride!
